div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1328 Sahnali, near Dalama (anc. Euhippe), Caria, 1952 Burial: c. 130-125 B.C. (Kleiner) Contents: 18 AR Cistophori Pergamum: 1; 1 half Ephesus: 4; 1 half Tralles: 1; 4 halves Apameia: 1; 1 half Synnada: 1; 1 half Unc.: 2 halves Disposition: Ankara (inv. no. 1240) Onat, Ankara Üniversitesi Dil ve Tarih-Cografya Fakültesi Dergisi 1959, pp. 139-44, illus. Atlan, Belleten 1960, pp. 485-91 Supplementary information from Saadet Taner To be published by F. Kleiner
